headline: Daily Dose Podcast: Deadly house fire in Cincinnati, four shot in Covington, Republican primary debate preview
author: WLWT Digital Staff
sentences: On Tuesday's edition of the WLWT News 5 TODAY Daily Dose Podcast, the crew discuss new developments in the death of a woman following a fire at a multi-family home in Cincinnati, four people, and three kids, being shot after a fight in Covington, Ky., a preview of Tuesday's WLWT-hosted Republican primary debate and more.
